title: Golding, Ole Miss edge Georgia, will meet Miami - ESPN
description: With a field goal and a safety in the final minute of the fourth quarter, Ole Miss defeated Georgia 39-34 in the Sugar Bowl to advance to the College Football Playoff semifinals against Miami.

title: Woman killed in suspected mountain lion attack while hiking in northern Colorado - ABC News
description: A woman was killed in a suspected mountain lion attack while she was hiking alone in the mountains of northern Colorado

title: Tommy Lee Jones’ daughter found dead at San Francisco hotel, reports say - San Francisco Chronicle
description: Victoria Jones, the daughter of actor Tommy Lee Jones, was found dead at San Francisco’s Fairmont Hotel on New Year’s Day, according to reports.

title: Japan PM joins fight for more female toilets in parliament - BBC
description: Japan's parliament building was built in 1936, a decade before women were given the right to vote.

title: Indiana throttles Alabama: Hoosiers leave no doubt en route to CFP semifinal berth vs. Oregon - CBS Sports
description: Indiana looked every bit the part of a No. 1 seed in a dominant victory over Alabama in the Rose Bowl College Football Playoff quarterfinal

title: Catholic influencer's 5-year-old son dies after 11-day flu battle followed by thousands - Fox News
description: Paul J. Kim announced his 5-year-old son Micah died after severe flu that turned septic and caused seizures after an 11-day hospital battle documented on social media.

title: 5 takeaways from Trump's defiant WSJ interview on his health - Axios
description: Trump told the WSJ he had a CT scan during a recent medical exam and not an MRI scan, as he previously claimed.

title: Will Smith sued over allegations he retaliated against violinist who reported sexual harassment - NBC News
description: A violinist accused Will Smith of retaliation after he said he was fired for reporting sexual harassment while on tour with the actor and rapper, according to a lawsuit filed earlier this week

title: McGuire: TTU not using layoff as excuse for loss - ESPN
description: Texas Tech's Joey McGuire didn't use the team's layoff ahead of Thursday's game as an excuse, instead pointing to inefficient early-down execution and costly turnovers as the primary reasons for a loss to "the best defense we've faced" in Oregon.

title: Why everything from your phone to your PC may get pricier in 2026 - BBC
description: The price of Ram - once one of the cheapest computer parts - has more than doubled since October 2025.
